Name: Dr Deficit
Text: With your bases, you take over the Manor, yes?

Name: William
Text: We'll have to eliminate all his units, or capture the headquarters right?

Name: Sally
Text: That's right. If we want to eliminate all his units-

Name: Sally
Text: We'll have to block or capture his bases as well.

Name: Dr Deficit
Text: There are radar towers here. You can capture and use them like other properties.

Name: Dr Deficit
Text: They'll also give you a boost to your power at the start of every turn!

Name: William
Text: It's going to be tough. Advisor, Sally do you think we can do it?

Name: Sally
Text: Time for payback Kronk! You're my prisoner now!
